mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_DIV, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_NAME, SERVICE_MIN, SALE_AMT, DEPT_SALE_AMT, INTRO_RATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, USE_YN, UNIT_DIV, ROUND_YN, CUST_LEVEL_DIV, FAMILY_YN, PROOFFI_DIV, PSEP_DIV, REG_DATE, SORT_ORDER FROM CODE_PRODUCT WHERE PSEP_DIV = 'S' AND USE_YN LIKE #{useYn} AND PRODUCT_DIV like #{productDiv} AND START_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND END_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{date}, 'YYYYMMDD') ORDER BY PRODUCT_DIV, PRODUCT_CODE
